response.original_title: Baroque Dance Unmasked: Workshop to Performance
response.overview: A vivid Baroque dance documentary produced by Dancetime Publications in association with Catherine Turocy, the renowned Artistic Director of The New York Baroque Dance Company. The film provides a rare look at the artistic process in re-creating dance and dance-theater, from studio to stage. Included is information about Baroque music, fencing, mask work, notation, costumes, and the inner life of dance performers working in this dance style.
response.title: Baroque Dance Unmasked: Workshop to Performance
